parameter-group.name: authentication
parameter-group.label: Authentication
parameter-group.description: Authentication for connecting to Google Cloud Platform.

parameter.name: oauthCode
parameter.label: Authorization Code
parameter.description:
This code is used once for retrieving the Google Cloud Platform access and refresh tokens. Open the following URL in your browser to generate an authorization code:

https://accounts.google.com/o/oauth2/v2/auth?scope=https://www.googleapis.com/auth/cloud-platform&access_type=offline&prompt=consent&include_granted_scopes=true&response_type=code&redirect_uri=https://www.google.com&client_id={{clientId}}

After your browser has been redirected to https://www.google.com, the authorization code will be set in the browser URL as value of the "code" URL query parameter.

parameter.name: singleUtteranceMode
parameter.label: Single Utterance Mode
parameter.description: When enabled Google Cloud Platform is responsible for detecting when to stop listening after a single utterance. (Recommended)

parameter.name: maxTranscriptionSeconds
parameter.label: Max Transcription Seconds
parameter.description: Max seconds to wait to force stop the transcription.

parameter.name: maxSilenceSeconds
parameter.label: Max Silence Seconds
parameter.description: Only works when singleUtteranceMode is disabled, max seconds without getting new transcriptions to stop listening.

parameter.name: refreshSupportedLocales
parameter.label: Refresh Supported Locales
parameter.description: Try loading supported locales from the documentation page.

parameter.name: noResultsMessage
parameter.label: No Results Message
parameter.description: Message to be told when no results. (Empty for disabled)

parameter.name: errorMessage
parameter.label: Error Message
parameter.description: Message to be told when an error has happened. (Empty for disabled)
